title: unran karuNai
sahitya:
unran karuNai kATTi enran kavalaiyOTTu cennaikkanda kOTTam sirakkum muruganE


anupallavi

  kaNNaik-kavarum arum kATSi tannaik-kANum eNNilAdAr pENum inbam aLippOnE


caraNam    mati mayakkamuTru mAya valaiyil sikki gati aLikkum unadu padamE shatamena nAn
tudi sheidadum en tuyarellAm maraiyavE ati viraivil parindu aruL purindiDum ayyE
